about.title: about
about.text: As a highly motivated Frontend developer, my experience covers Israel, Russia and United States. I have extensive experience building single page applications and mobile applications. I constantly seek to improve my developer skill set by completing additional courses and staying up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies.

item1.company: Front-end Web Developer at Edeal Inc
item1.text: Conceptualized and developed a comprehensive, reusable component library, streamlining the development process and promoting consistent design across projects.

item2.company: Front-end Web Developer at Get Robo VPN
item2.text: Developed a responsive and user-friendly Single Page Application (SPA) for seamless integration into the Telegram Web App Bot.

item3.text: Diagnosed and resolved complex coding issues, provided one-one mentorship to a group of over 70 students, and enhanced students understanding of best practices in web development.

item4.company: Front-end Web Developer at Ava Mind
item4.text: Developed a responsive and user-friendly Single Page Application (SPA). Assumed a leadership role in strategizing project roadmap, effectively coordinating with key stakeholders to maintain alignment throughout the development process.
